short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get personalised and discreet recommendation on how to improve Wikipedia.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides personalized recommendations about possible improvements to the article you are reading.

A WikiGnome is a wiki user who makes useful incremental edits without clamoring for attention. WikiGnomes work behind the scenes of a wiki, tying up little loose ends and making things run more smoothly: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:WikiGnome

We are in beta! Reach out for comments and feedback!
